name: Apple
description: An apple is a round fruit with red or green skin and a whitish inside. One variety of apple might be sweet, another sour.

name: Banana
description: A banana is a curved, yellow fruit with a thick skin and soft sweet flesh.

name: Mango
description: A mango is a sweet tropical fruit, and it's also the name of the trees on which the fruit grows. Ripe mangoes are juicy, fleshy, and delicious.

name: Strawberry
description: Strawberries are soft, sweet, bright red berries. They're also delicious.

name: Watermelon
description: Watermelon is large, juicy fruit with a hard green rind and sweet watery red pulp.

name: Pineapple
description: A pineapple is a sweet tropical fruit with a tough leathery skin and spiky leaves on top.
